entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
